Trade/Device Name(s): UriSponge™ - Urine Collection, Transport, and Preservation System
Specimen Container(s): Screw cap self-standing plastic tube with hydrophilic polyurethane sponge
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Transport medium with chemical preservatives (Sodium Propionate, Potassium Sorbate)
Methodologies: Specimen collection and preservation for cultivation of uropathogenic bacteria and yeasts
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Copan UriSponge urine collection, transport, and preservation system for maintaining viability of uropathogenic bacteria and yeasts in urine specimens
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for the collection, transport, and preservation of urine specimens from the collection site to the testing laboratory; specimens processed for cultivation of uropathogenic bacteria and yeasts using standard laboratory procedures
